format: A data frame containing 915 observations on 6 variables.

parameters.mentor: Number of articles published by student's mentor.
parameters.kids: Number of children less than 6 years old.
parameters.articles: Number of articles published during last 3 years of PhD.
parameters.married: factor. Is the PhD student married?

title: Doctoral Publications
description:
Description
Cross-section data on the scientific productivity of PhD students in biochemistry.
